ca.ualberta.cs.controllers

Class BrowseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.controllers.BrowseController

  • public class BrowseController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the data in the model of the BrowseActivity Also takes care of sorting Contains a list of ForumEntries and the searchController and determines whether we use the favourites or readLater view

      Creates a new BrowseController.
